rows.label: tlk45420151_03_msg0001
rows.name:
When a Blade is awakened from a Core
Crystal, the form they take is
influenced by the Driver's heart.

rows.label: tlk45420151_03_msg0002
rows.name:
So the classic strategy is to use
a booster to enhance whichever
aspect you're already strongest in.

rows.label: tlk45420151_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But if you're looking to awaken a
different kind of Blade from usual,
it's worth boosting a different aspect.

rows.label: tlk45420151_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Of course, none of this makes it a
sure thing. At the end of the day,
the Blade you get is down to luck.
